channel.title: DarkRise Dev. Team Now Recruiting Come On I Need Hosters Coders And Staff
channel.description:
After I Hire My Lawyer *In Process Atm* !Forums Are Coming!
I Need A Few Hosters That Can Code Also They Will Be Auto Co-Owners
Any Coder That Can Code Rune/Black/Gold... Party Hats Will Be Auto Accepted
Ip Wanted- DarkShadowScape.no-ip.biz Port Wanted- Defualt (43594)*If Needed Others Will Work
Hoster's/Coder's --- Coder's-5 Open*Auto P.Mod* Hoster's-5 Open*Auto Admin* Both Hoster's And Coder's-Digzey*2 Open*Co-Owners*
Owners --- Head Owner-DarkRise/ShadowBlade Semi-Head *Co*Owners-Mod Italia*1 Open Reg.*Co*Owners-3 Open
Admin --- Head Admin-Open Semi Head Admins-3 Open Reg.Admins-LeScape*4 Open
P-Mods --- Head P.Mod-Open Semi-Head P.Mods-2 Open Reg.P.Mods-7 Open
Apply LayOut
In-Game Name Will Be Rank Wanted *Semi-Head/Reg./(Ect..) Age Exp With Job When Will You Leave Us *Dont Have To Do* Info Bout Your-Self *If Hoster Only* What Hr's Can You Host *E.g: 24/7* *If Coder Only* Can You Code Gold/Black/Rune...Party Hats

item.title: DarkRise Dev. Team Now Recruiting Come On I Need Hosters Coders And Staff
item.dc:creator: @hydra_dragon hydra dragon
item.description:
@hydra_dragon wrote:

[quote=“digzey, post:4, topic:146828”]hey i can host and code but not today…
ask most people on this forum i have experiance
i wont leave you if i code
i host english hours say 3 hrs a day… nm but if you get others[/quote]Accepted

LeScape I Guess Your Accepted But Make Server Finish Slowly
